description: If you're still somehow on the fence about buying a Steam Deck, here's a good chance for you to get one cheaper as Valve given two models a discount.
title: Steam Deck LCD 64GB and 512GB discounted until July 11

description: Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge is another wonderful game built with Godot Engine, for gamers who prefer things a whole lot more chilled.
title: Slow down a bit and go collecting in Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge

description: A Yahtzee Roguelike experience? That's going to be a thing. FokazLabs recently revealed Pip My Dice and the idea does sound quite interesting.
title: Rig the game in Pip My Dice, a Yahtzee roguelike experience inspired by Balatro

description: One of my favourite RTS games, Warzone 2100, just keeps on getting better thanks to it being open source. A major new Beta has been released that has some really great improvements for both singleplayer and online play.
title: Warzone 2100 version 4.5.0 Beta enhances support for campaign mods, improved multiplayer

description: Flathub, the main front-end for Flatpak packages, which serves various applications and games to many different Linux distributions and Steam Deck has surpassed 2 billion downloads.
title: Flathub continues growing with over 2 billion downloads recorded

description: Developer Mike Blumenkrantz has another blog post up and Merge Request ready for Mesa, the set of open source graphics drivers, which gives a big boost to performance for Windows games with various videos.
title: Mesa gets a nice performance boost for Proton games with various videos

description: NonSteamLaunchers is one of the simplest ways to get various other stores like Battle.net, Epic, GOG and more on Steam Deck / Linux has a fresh release adding some useful features.
title: NonSteamLaunchers adds support for EmuDeck, SteamRomManager and fixes Battle.net

description: Released today with Native Linux support, Dice & Fold from Tinymice Entertainment is a turn-based dungeon crawler where your only way of attacking the enemy is by rolling dice.
title: Dice rolling dungeon crawler Dice & Fold is out now
